title: Margo Feiden, Hirschfeld’s Idiosyncratic Gallerist, Dies at 77
description: She handled the sales of the great caricaturist’s works and told stories of flying Diane Arbus in her plane and encountering the woman who shot Andy Warhol.
dc:creator: Neil Genzlinger and Alex Traub
media:description: The gallerist Margo Feiden in 2014. She was best known for the more than 30 years she spent representing the caricaturist Al Hirschfeld.
